Name: Oik Memory 2
About the game: Casual memory puzzle. At the beginning of each round in a short time the game marks from 4 to 12 blocks. You need to open these blocks in the right order! 2000+ Achievements: 50 levels Relaxing music Music by Trauerbaum 'Oik Memory 2' Powered By Clickteam Fusion 2.5
